column5: Our place is ideal for a family trip or an alumni reunion for game weekends, especially if you want to save on taxi cabs and pet boarding fees. We have 3 bedrooms, all with queen sized mattresses (including a Tempurpedic Cloud Supreme). We are completely pet friendly, our kitchen is well-equipped for cooking, and our coffee station is always fully stocked.
column8: Walk to Kyle Field and Reed Arena!
